headline: EPAM Announces Date for First Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital transformation services and product engineering company, will host a conference call at 8:00 a.m. ET, on Thursday, May 8, 2025, to discuss its first quarter 2025 financial results. A news release containing these results will be issued before the call.
